formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'StopMonitor' =-
[Synopsis] Stop monitoring a channel
[Description] StopMonitor Stops monitoring a channel. Has no effect if the channel is not monitored

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Stop monitoring a channel
[Description] - StopMonitor + StopMonitor(): Stops monitoring a channel. Has no effect if the channel is not monitored
